alert.note: Alert for Dent; Shannon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 3:56PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN SHANNON AND EASTERN DENT COUNTIES THROUGH 430 PM CDT... At 356 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Viburnum to 6 miles east of Eminence. Movement was north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Ozark National Scenic Riverways, Eminence, Bunker, Boss, Howes Mill and Midridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
